post.text:
Donald Trump agreed to release his tax returns if he ran for office.

Now? "It's none of your business." What's he hiding?

comment.author: Nathalie
comment.text: They have to provide a tax form when running for office, so everything they are looking for should be there.

replies.author: Shea
replies.text: Only past politicians are required to show tax returns. It's to show they are not taking money from outside people like foreign countries. You know like Saudi Arabia. Let's see the real tax returns from the Clinton Foundation were they launder their money through. They only donate 10% to charities.
